issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Upgrade fails due to incompatible postgres data

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Upgrading from 4.0.2 to 4.1 is failing. It is erroring with inability to start postgres.

This was a basic topology single front end and 1 NC.

{code}

comments.body:
The old database version setting is missing from the build time configuration:

{code}
#
# unzip -p /usr/share/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-postgresql-4.1.0.jar postgresql-binaries.properties
# Copyright 2011-2014 Eucalyptus Systems, Inc.
#
# Redistribution and use of this software in source and binary forms,
# with or without modification, are permitted provided that the following
# conditions are met:
#
#   Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
#   this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
#
#   Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
#   notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
#   documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
#
# THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS
# "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT
# LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR
# A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT
# OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
# SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT
# LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE,
# DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY
# THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT
# (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE
# OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

euca.db.home=/usr/pgsql-9.2
euca.db.suffix=
euca.db.old.home=
euca.db.old.suffix=
#
#
{code}

This could be a problem with the configure script or the build time options (will take a look at the configure script first)
Derp.  Try the next build once it finishes.

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.0
Release     : 0.0.22972.325.20150112git82fd3a2.el6

Successfully upgraded db from 4.0.2 to 4.01
{code}
